Usage

{{codeSamples[1]}}

Attributes

  • languages (array): A list of all supported language codes.
  • on-change (function): A callback. Should take a single argument, language, which is the country code of the language that was selected.
    The language object has the following fields:

    Example for locale sk-SK
    • language.englishName= Slovak (Slovakia)
    • language.nativeName= Slovenƒçina (Slovakia)
    • language.code= sk-SK
    • language.asLowDashCode()= sk_SK
    • language.country= sk

  • flags (boolean): Enable or disable displaying language flag next a language. By default are flags enabled. The country flags are parsed from locale. So please specify a locale fully - 'en-US' instead of 'en'.
  • template (String): a name for a custom modal template. By default is language-picker-dialog.tpl.html

Instalation

bower install azachar/angular-language-picker --save

Include css and js dependencies for Bootstrap, FontAwesome and flag-icon into your index.html. If you are using grunt-wiredep, it should be done automatically.
